org.corfudb.runtime.protocols.sequencers

Interface IStreamSequencer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IServerProtocol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemorySequencerProtocol

    public interface IStreamSequencer
extends IServerProtocol
    This interface represents a sequencer with support for streaming. Streaming sequencers store additional information about the streams they are serving.

      • Fields inherited from interface org.corfudb.runtime.protocols.IServerProtocol
